Package enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameControl
    Takes actions from GUI and modifies model accordingdly.
    RollBehavior
    Roll behavior interface for use with Yatzy and variants.
    ScoringBehavior
    Score selection behavior for use with Yatzy games.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameControlImpl
    Main control for a Yatzy game.
    RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy
    Maxi Yatzy rolling.
    RollBehaviorYatzy
    Standard Yatzy rolling.
    SelectiveScoreSelection
    The most common variant of score selection gives full flexibility on where to put a dice result.
